Mr. William G. Harley
Washington 6, D. C.
--2
6/12/62
In summary, I cannot disagree more with the action of the NAEB Board
in authorizing an experiment in the production of television programs.
I sincerely hope that this project will not be carried out.
Sincerely yours.
